costoffice

Source: vignettes/costoffice.Rmd
costoffice.Rmd
library(costoffice)


Motivation

The costoffice package contains functions enabling the user to access the latest Physician Office Visit Costs datasets from Data.CMS.gov.

There are 83 datasets in total, each representing a different medical specialty. Each one contains the:

  • Most Utilized Procedure Code (HCPCS Level II aka CPT code)
  • Minimum/Maximum/Mode Price Medicare Paid
  • Minimum/Maximum/Mode Copay the Patient Paid

by zip code, for new and established patients both.


Retrieve Dataset Info with search_datasets()


search_datasets() retrieves information on the 83 available data sets, separated by physician specialty. If you’re searching for one specialty in particular, just supply the specialty argument:


search_datasets(specialty = "cardiac surgery") |> 
  tidytable::glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 6
#> $ specialty <chr> "cardiac surgery"
#> $ title     <chr> "Cardiac Surgery Office Visit Costs"
#> $ issued    <date> 2022-07-11
#> $ modified  <date> 2022-07-11
#> $ released  <date> 2022-07-14
#> $ csv_url   <chr> "https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/sites/default/files/reso…


The result contains three dates related to the last time the data was updated and the download link for the csv file.


To retrieve information on all of the data sets (83 specialties in total), simply call search_datasets() with no arguments:


search_datasets()
#> # A tidytable: 83 × 6
#>    specialty                      title issued     modified   released   csv_url
#>    <chr>                          <chr> <date>     <date>     <date>     <chr>  
#>  1 addiction medicine             Addi… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  2 advanced heart failure and tr… Adva… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  3 allergy/ immunology            Alle… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  4 anesthesiology                 Anes… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  5 cardiac surgery                Card… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  6 cardiology                     Card… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  7 certified clinical nurse spec… Cert… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  8 certified nurse midwife        Cert… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#>  9 certified registered nurse an… Cert… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#> 10 clinic or group practice       Clin… 2022-07-11 2022-07-11 2022-07-14 https:…
#> # ℹ 73 more rows

Downloading A Dataset


costoffice uses Mark Fairbanks’ excellent tidytable package underneath the hood (with it using data.table under it’s hood), resulting in much smaller download sizes and lightning fast data operations.


Each individual data set has approximately 43k rows and is roughly 8 MB on disk/in memory.


cardio <- search_datasets(specialty = "cardiology") |> 
  download_dataset()
lobstr::obj_size(cardio)
#> 14.78 MB


cardio |> 
  tidytable::slice_sample(n = 10) |> 
  knitr::kable()
specialty zip_code hcpcs patient cost min max mode range
cardiology 43925 99204 new price 56.744 173.944 131.592 117.200
cardiology 08003 99214 est price 20.448 158.016 113.472 137.568
cardiology 30240 99204 new price 55.192 169.736 128.376 114.544
cardiology 27588 99204 new copay 14.128 43.164 32.670 29.036
cardiology 16927 99214 est copay 4.398 35.520 25.406 31.122
cardiology 33474 99214 est copay 4.670 37.914 27.092 33.244
cardiology 53189 99204 new price 55.632 169.160 128.120 113.528
cardiology 31295 99214 est price 16.800 138.360 98.792 121.560
cardiology 31008 99204 new copay 13.798 42.434 32.094 28.636
cardiology 10176 99214 est price 21.656 169.664 121.624 148.008



Geocoding with zipcodeR


costoffice includes a subset of zip code data from Gavin Rozzi’s amazing zipcodeR package:


data("zip_db")
zip_db |> tidytable::slice_head()
#> # A tidytable: 5 × 10
#>   zip_code city     county state state_name state_region demo        geo        
#>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>  <chr> <chr>      <fct>        <list>      <list>     
#> 1 35004    Moody    St. C… AL    Alabama    South        <tidytable> <tidytable>
#> 2 35005    Adamsvi… Jeffe… AL    Alabama    South        <tidytable> <tidytable>
#> 3 35006    Adger    Jeffe… AL    Alabama    South        <tidytable> <tidytable>
#> 4 35007    Alabast… Shelb… AL    Alabama    South        <tidytable> <tidytable>
#> 5 35010    Alexand… Talla… AL    Alabama    South        <tidytable> <tidytable>
#> # ℹ 2 more variables: is_zcta <lgl>, zcta_crosswalk <list>


Putting use_zipcoder() in the pipe chain will add this information to the data table:


search_datasets(specialty = "vascular surgery") |> 
  download_dataset() |> 
  tidytable::slice_sample(n = 10) |> 
  use_zipcoder() |> 
  knitr::kable()
specialty city county state zip_code hcpcs patient cost min max mode range state_name state_region
vascular surgery Alexandria Huntingdon County PA 16611 99203 new copay 14.256 43.514 21.990 29.258 Pennsylvania Northeast
vascular surgery Brevard Transylvania County NC 28712 99213 est copay 4.358 35.246 17.738 30.888 North Carolina South
vascular surgery Starks Calcasieu Parish LA 70661 99203 new copay 14.004 43.196 21.722 29.192 Louisiana South
vascular surgery Parthenon Newton County AR 72666 99213 est price 16.264 133.848 67.144 117.584 Arkansas South
vascular surgery Lincolnton Lincoln County NC 28093 99213 est copay 4.358 35.246 17.738 30.888 North Carolina South
vascular surgery Stilesville Hendricks County IN 46180 99203 new price 54.768 167.544 84.544 112.776 Indiana North Central
vascular surgery Melbourne Brevard County FL 32935 99203 new copay 14.600 44.698 22.562 30.098 Florida South
vascular surgery Burdine Letcher County KY 41517 99203 new price 54.720 168.416 84.752 113.696 Kentucky South
vascular surgery Benton Saline County AR 72018 99203 new price 53.136 163.672 82.312 110.536 Arkansas South
vascular surgery Shelbyville Bedford County TN 37161 99203 new price 54.584 167.192 84.320 112.608 Tennessee South



Summary Statistics by State


Current average prices & copays by state for an office visit by a New Patient to a Vascular Surgeon:


search_datasets(specialty = "vascular surgery") |> 
  download_dataset() |> 
  use_zipcoder() |> 
  tidytable::select(specialty, 
                    state, 
                    tidytable::starts_with("new_")) |> 
  tidytable::summarise(avg_price_mode = round(mean(new_price_mode), 2),
                       avg_copay_mode = round(mean(new_copay_mode), 2),
                       .by = c(specialty, 
                               state, 
                               new_code)) |> 
  tidytable::drop_na() |> 
  knitr::kable()
#> Error in `tidyselect_locs()`:
#> ! Can't subset columns that don't exist.
#> ✖ Column `new_code` doesn't exist.


Current average prices & copays by state for an office visit by an Established Patient to a Cardiologist:


search_datasets(specialty = "cardiology") |> 
  download_dataset() |> 
  use_zipcoder() |> 
  tidytable::select(specialty, 
                    state, 
                    tidytable::starts_with("est_")) |> 
  tidytable::summarise(avg_price_mode = round(mean(est_price_mode), 2),
                       avg_copay_mode = round(mean(est_copay_mode), 2),
                       .by = c(specialty, 
                               state, 
                               est_code)) |> 
  tidytable::drop_na() |> 
  knitr::kable()
#> Error in `tidyselect_locs()`:
#> ! Can't subset columns that don't exist.
#> ✖ Column `est_code` doesn't exist.
